overview: After Reza, a non-binary rising performing artist from a township in Soweto, begins to settle into Johannesburg, Mase, a writer struggling to understand his identity, unexpectedly arrives into his life. They begin to reveal intimate vulnerabilities that both arenâ€™t willing to confront, and as they fall in and out of reality, both discover the endless opportunities to create uninhibited joy out of their past traumas.
title: THANDO
